code: import{ALERT,USER}from"../../constants";import store from"../../redux/store";export const updateVerification=()=>dispatch=>{let state=store.getState();console.log("[updateVerification]");state.channel.user.listen("OndatoEvent",e=>{console.log("!!!!! EVENT BY SOCKETS [OndatoEvent]:",e);dispatch({type:USER.USER_FIELD,payload:{ondato_status:e.ondato_status}});if(e.ondato_status===1||e.ondato_status===4){dispatch({type:ALERT.ALERT_ERROR,payload:e.message});}else{dispatch({type:ALERT.ALERT_SUCCESS,payload:e.message});}});};
